doc:
Denise Legeay https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denise_Legeay 0 Denise Legeay (22 January 1898 – 27 May 1968) was a French film actress whose popularity peaked during the silent film era of the 1920s. Legeay made her film debut at age 23 in the 1921 film "L’infante à la rose" and would continue to act in films until 1926, including a ten episode film serial "Vingt ans après" in 1922. Denise_Legeay ( 22_January_1898 – 27_May_1968 ) was a_French_film_actress whose_popularity peaked during the_silent_film_era of the_1920s . Legeay made her_film_debut at age_23 in the_1921_film " L’infante_à_la rose " and would_continue_to_act in films until 1926 , including a_ten_episode_film_serial " Vingt_ans_après " in 1922 .
